page.title: 09Bed and Breakfast
page.content: As the area is important for tourism, local people offer facilities in their homes for Bed and Breakfast. Visitors like a full "English breakfast" such as bacon and eggs, cereals and toast with tea or coffee. One person who started to provide accommodation in Easter l985 charges Â£8 per person. Visitors come from England and America - California, San Fransisco and Colorado. They have a double and a single bedroom - each having a shower or bathroom, and are open from Easter to September. They get visitors through the local Tourist Board.
